statements: UPDATE ContentDistribution SET platform_name='Social Media', audience_demographics='{"age": 25, "gender": "female"}', engagement_metrics='{"likes": 150, "shares": 75}' WHERE platform_id=1;
UPDATE ContentDistribution SET engagement_metrics='{"likes": 200, "shares": 100}', audience_demographics='{"age": 30, "gender": "male"}', platform_name='Online Forum' WHERE platform_id=2;
UPDATE ContentDistribution SET platform_name = 'YouTube', engagement_metrics = '{"views": 1000, "likes": 500, "comments": 200}' WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE ContentDistribution SET audience_demographics = '{"age": [18, 25, 35], "gender": {"male": 60, "female": 40}}', platform_name = 'Instagram' WHERE platform_id = 2;
UPDATE PlatformData SET distribution_channel='Online' WHERE platform_name='Twitter'
UPDATE AudienceDemographics SET location='New York' WHERE gender='Female' AND age_group='25-34'
UPDATE PlatformData SET platform_name = 'Updated Platform A', content_type = 'Movie' WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE AudienceDemographics SET gender = 'Female', location = 'New York' WHERE audience_id = 2;
UPDATE platforms SET platform_name = 'Twitter' WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET views = 100, likes = 50 WHERE platform_id = 2 AND audience_id = 1;
UPDATE platforms SET platform_name = 'Updated Platform', platform_type = 'Social Media' WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE engagement_metrics SET likes = 100, shares = 50 WHERE platform_id = 2 AND audience_id = 3;
UPDATE Platforms SET platform_name = 'New Platform Name' WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE Content SET platform_id = 2 WHERE content_id = 1;
UPDATE Platforms SET platform_name = 'New Platform Name', platform_type = 'New Type' WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE Audience SET audience_age = 30, audience_gender = 'Male' WHERE audience_id = 2;
UPDATE Platform SET platform_name = 'New Platform Name' WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE Audience SET age_range = '18-35' WHERE audience_id = 2;
UPDATE Platform SET platform_name = 'Updated Platform Name' WHERE platform_id = 1;
UPDATE Audience SET age_range = '18-34', location = 'New York' WHERE audience_id = 2;
